config.option.description.main_render: This is the main render. Make sure to turn this on first!
config.option.description.block_destruct: Render the blocks to be destroyed by explosion.
config.option.description.block_detectio: Render the detection rays for detecting the blocks to be destroyed by explosion.
config.option.description.sample_points: Render in range entity's sample-points for ray-cast in explosion.
config.option.description.explosion_dama: Render explosion damage for in-range entities.
config.description.block_detection_ray_s:
In Minecraft, 1532 rays are emitted from the center of the explosion towards the outermost layer of a 16x16x16 voxel grid surrounding the explosion center. 
(See" https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Explosion" for details.)

Displaying them all together can look very cluttered. This command allows you to slice these rays for easier viewing.
